snippet: China has announced a plan, seven years in the making, to allow two-way investment between the Shanghai and Hong Kong stock exchanges.
abstract: China announces plan, seven years in the making, to allow two-way investment between Shanghai and Hong Kong stock exchanges.
lead_paragraph: China has announced a plan, seven years in the making, to allow two-way investment between the Shanghai and Hong Kong stock exchanges.

headline.main: China Sets Hong Kong-Shanghai Trading Deal
headline.print_headline: China to Allow Stock Trade Across Hong Kong Border
